name: Trucker Skill Driving 3D
description:
Drive cargo supply tanker and transport fuel at sub oil stations in city
Perform the duty of heavy oil supply truck driver in mountain hilly environment
It’s time to start heavy duty of oil new tanker driving in this transporting game. Let’s start drive of extreme powerful engine to feel the thrill of off road driving and amazement of city. Get real experience of big oil cargo trailer driving and face the off road mountains traffic. Who love off road transporter games with cargo oil deliver truck driving duty, here is the perfect challenge for them. This gasoline cargo game has an ultimate fun of parking and driving simulator. Play now and enjoy this grand city oil truck driver 3d game, to feel the real environment of oil supply trucking and heavy duty of oil transport on off road tracks and city traffic. Just keep performing the ultimate duty of oil trailer driver by supplying the free oil continuously to off road gas and city stations.
